Plain table with alternative headers

Your circumstances
Effects of condition Dyslexia or another specific learning difficulty
Support requested
Course materials Audio versions of printed material
Electronic text of printed material
Transcripts of broadcasts and audio visual material
Other facilities Alternative examination arrangements
Disability information
Dyslexia, dyspraxia and dyscalcula
General and educational information

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.

Headings on left

To avoid a double border if the table contains headings in the left hand column, use the table class "ou-table-headings-left".

Name Stephen Turvey
PI 3428438
OUCU 23949
Address 5 Bellman's Drive
Milton Keynes
Buckinghamshire
MK05 4NH
Delivery address As above
Phone (day, preferred) 01234 567891
Phone (mobile) 07782 132456

Additional classes

You can specify the column widths if you like...

  • table.ou-dist25 - makes all cols 25% wide (for 4 col tables)
  • table.ou-dist33 - makes all cols 33% wide (for 3 col tables)
  • table.ou-dist50 - makes all cols 50% wide (for 2 col tables)

Or to specify widths for individual columns use these classes on the <th>...

  • th.ou-column-w-10 - makes this columns 10% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-15 - 15% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-20 - 20% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-25 - 25% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-30 - 30% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-40 - 40% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-50 - 50% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-60 - 60% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-70 - 70% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-80 - 80% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-90 - 90% wide
  • th.ou-column-w-100 - 100% wide

The class ou-table-headers-style1 can be combined with the ou-table-plain to give the headers a solid light grey background (example above).
